biography.placeOfBirth: Bönhof, West Prussia, Germany [now Benowo, Pomorskie, Poland]
biography.bio: Actually a lathe operator he decided to become actor at the age of 23. Studied play at the 'Schauspielschule', Berlin-Oberschoeneweide (GDR) Played at the 'Schauspielhaus', Dresden since 1984. Has had several appearances in former GDR TV.
biography.name: Horst Krause

biography.bio: Carmen-Maja Antoni was born on August 23, 1945 in Berlin, Germany. She is known for her work on The Reader (2008), The White Ribbon (2009) and Knallharte Jungs (2002). She was previously married to Malte Antoni.
biography.name: Carmen-Maja Antoni

biography.placeOfBirth: Karl-Marx-Stadt, German Democratic Republic [now Chemnitz, Federal Republic of Germany]
biography.bio: Jörg Schüttauf was born on December 26, 1961 in Karl-Marx-Stadt, German Democratic Republic. He is an actor, known for Der Fahnder (1984), Berlin Is in Germany (2001) and Fritz Bauer, un héros allemand (2015). He is married to Martina. They have one child.
biography.name: Jörg Schüttauf

biography.bio: Fritzi Haberlandt was born on June 6, 1975 in East Berlin, East Germany. She is an actress, known for Peas at 5:30 (2004), Lonely U (2012) and Learning to Lie (2003).
biography.name: Fritzi Haberlandt

biography.bio: Andreas Schmidt was born on November 23, 1963 in Heggen, North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany as Andreas M. Schmidt. He is an actor and writer, known for The Counterfeiters (2007), Un été à Berlin (2005) and Pigs Will Fly (2002). He is married to Jennifer. They have one child.
biography.name: Andreas Schmidt

biography.bio: Angelika Böttiger is an actress, known for Castle Einstein (1998), West (2013) and Hands off Mississippi (2007).
biography.name: Angelika Böttiger

biography.bio: Tilo Prückner was born on October 26, 1940 in Augsburg, Germany. He is an actor, known for The NeverEnding Story (1984), Iron Sky (2012) and The Counterfeiters (2007).
biography.name: Tilo Prückner

biography.bio: Fritz Roth was born in 1955 in Bad Laasphe, North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany. He is an actor, known for The Reader (2008), Unknown (2011) and Hansel & Gretel: Witch Hunters (2013).
biography.name: Fritz Roth

biography.placeOfBirth: Bautzen, German Democratic Republic [now Saxony, Federal Republic of Germany]
biography.bio: Roman Knizka was born on February 8, 1970 in Bautzen, German Democratic Republic. He is an actor, known for My Brother the Vampire (2001), Oublie l'Amérique (2000) and Nuts & Bolts (2003).
biography.name: Roman Knizka

biography.bio: Marie Luise Winkendick is an actress, known for Krauses Geheimnis (2014), For Miriam (2009) and Mord mit Aussicht (2008).
biography.name: Marie Luise Winkendick

biography.bio: Gunter Böhnke was born on September 1, 1943 in Dresden, Germany. He is an actor, known for Krauses Geheimnis (2014), Die Politesse (2005) and Die Politesse - Der Film (2006). He is married to Reinhild Böhnke. They have two children.
biography.name: Gunter Böhnke

biography.bio: Katja Wagner is an educated actress, born February 5th, 1978 in Bad Soden, Germany. She has acted in several tv- and feature films and has written and produced her first independent short in 2014. The former dancer is fluent in English and has basic knowledge in French and some Martial Arts.
biography.name: Katja Wagner

biography.bio: Till Butterbach is known for his work on Border Patrol (2013), Little Thirteen (2012) and L'un contre l'autre (2007).
biography.name: Till Butterbach

biography.bio: Heiko Schwind is an actor, known for Krauses Geheimnis (2014), Where the Street Ends (2014) and Bukow and König (1971).
biography.name: Heiko Schwind

biography.bio: Bettina was born near the alpha world city Frankfurt. Her childhood in England sparked off her love for British television and theatre. She attended elementary & secondary school in Germany, where she made her debut performing in plays & musicals as well as in concerts as a solo singer (and later cellist & pianist) at the age of 7. She moved back to the UK to study Drama & Dance at the prestigious London Studio Centre & Middlesex University in London. Since then, Bettina has lived in several cities & countries and whirled across sets & stages in occident & orient: Upon graduation she toured the UK, Europe and the Middle East and returned to Germany to work as an actress, singer and dancer in prestigious theaters such as Komische Oper Berlin (awarded Company of the Year 2015 at the International London Opera Awards & Opera House of the Season 2013/14), Theater am Goetheplatz Bremen, Operettenhaus Hamburg. In 2009, Bettina decided to additionally pursue a career in film & television, thus she auditioned for a postgraduate acting course at the Institute for Film & Television Berlin and was accepted into the Camera Actors Studio program. Bettina's feature film debut was the role of Contemporary dancer Birke in Russendisko (2012). Her first co-written & self-produced short Schauspieler 3.0 - Freude am Besetzen (2013) was awarded in the Category "Special" at the Film Festival Munich 2013. Moreover, Bettina has been working as a choreographer, writer, director and voice artist.
biography.name: Bettina Kenney

categories.category: Best Actress in a Comedy Role (Beste Schauspielerin in einer komödiantischen Rolle)
